parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the migration workflow.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the migration workflow.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the migration workflow.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the migration workflow.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the migration workflow.

nested_items.name: templateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the template.

nested_items.name: adsApplicationConfigurationId
nested_items.description: The configuration ID of the application configured in Application Discovery Service.

nested_items.name: adsApplicationName
nested_items.description: The name of the application configured in Application Discovery Service.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the migration workflow.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message of the migration workflow.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the migration workflow was created.

nested_items.name: lastStartTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the migration workflow was last started.

nested_items.name: lastStopTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the migration workflow was last stopped.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the migration workflow was last modified.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the migration workflow ended.

nested_items.name: tools
nested_items.description: List of AWS services utilized in a migration workflow.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of an AWS service.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL of an AWS service.

nested_items.name: totalSteps
nested_items.description: The total number of steps in the migration workflow.

nested_items.name: completedSteps
nested_items.description: Get a list of completed steps in the migration workflow.

nested_items.name: workflowInputs
nested_items.description: The inputs required for creating the migration workflow.
